about_the_game:
Featuring a collection of 81 tracks, the TEVI soundtrack showcases diverse and bold musical styles that bring to life the rich vistas and mysterious hues of the world of TEVI. These dynamic compositions immerse us as we explore and battle through unknown lands on our journey through Az.

Let's experience the evocative soundscapes shaped by these melodies and remember all the adventures and stories that have unfolded along the way!

name: TEVI - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 690 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
